metadata.title: CVE-2020-12625 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Roundcube Webmail before 1.4.4. There is across-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in rcube_washtml.php becauseJavaScript code can occur in the CDATA of an HTML message.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12625` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-core - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-mysql - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-pgsql - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-plugins - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
roundcube-sqlite3 - 1.4.4+dfsg.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: roundcube package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.4+dfsg.1-1').
